summary: Completed comprehensive frontend testing of Sankalp restaurant landing page. All major functionality working correctly with only one minor issue found.

ui_bugs.issue: Mobile menu missing data-testid attribute for 'mobile-menu'

passed_tests: Hero section displays correct headline and subheadline with awards
Book Your Table Now button links to https://url-shortener.me/DI2X and opens in new tab
View Our Menu button links to Google Drive PDF and opens in new tab
Navbar has logo, navigation links (Our Dishes, Reviews, Visit Us), phone number, Book a Table button
Awards marquee shows Guinness World Record Holder, Times Food Award Winner, and other awards
Signature dishes section shows 4 food images from Sankalp gallery
Testimonials section shows reviews from Ghumakkad Foodie (5/5) and Manoj Madhavan (4/5)
Location section shows correct address, phone (+91-9557135858), opening hours (9:30 AM - 11 PM)
Floating 20% OFF offer button is visible, clickable, and dismissible
Get Directions button links to Google Maps
Footer displays correctly with copyright and website link
Mobile responsive design works correctly with mobile menu
Navigation links scroll to correct sections
All external links open in new tabs
Phone numbers are clickable tel: links
All interactive elements have proper data-testid attributes (except one minor issue)
action_item_for_main_agent: Add missing data-testid="mobile-menu" attribute to mobile menu dropdown div for complete test coverage
